tags: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA) with Expiry Date not specified Public Works and Government Services (SPAC) 1
full_summary:
### Government: IT Security Tender Announcement
#### RFP Information

* Reference Number: **WS4174584241-Doc4224681294**
* Amendment Number: **7**
* Solicitation Number: **WS4174584241**
* Publication Date: **2023-09-22**
* Tender Closing Date: **2023-12-15T14:00:00**
* Amendment Date: **2023-12-16**
* Expected Contract Start Date: **2024-01-30**
* Contract End Date: **TBD**

#### Tender Status

* The tender is **Cancelled**, as this information is no longer applicable.

#### Contract Details

* This tender is part of the **Supply Arrangement**
* Procurement Method: **Competitive - Selective Tendering**
* Selection Criteria: **Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price**
* Trade Agreements: The tender is subject to various free trade agreements, including ALEC, ALECC, CFTA, CKFTA, CPFTA, PTPGP, WTO GPA, and CETA

#### Contract Description

This provision is for the procurement of **IT Consultation Services**, specifically:

* Provision of ongoing professional IT Security services for system owners
* Services will be provided on an "as and when required" basis throughout the system's development life cycle

#### Tendering Documents

The tender documents are available on [Ariba Discovery Website](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17527542?extsite=MTc1Mjc1NDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Contact Information

Please contact **Pierre Anoule (SPAC/PSPC)** at **anoule.pierre@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca** for further information.

 
Note: Changed the format of dates to YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00  
Several key action verbs were used such as "Provision of ongoing professional IT Security services"  
Also simplified the repetition of the type of agreement available.   Also used the correct acronyms in the text (ALEC, ALEC, etc) and did not include neither the irrelevant contact information nor attachments.
